name: Storylog
body:
### Purpose
The purpose of this project is to learn Ruby on Rails and use GitHub.  I expect to create something basic and then build it out and ultimately deploy it for my own use.

### Authors and Contributors
Project started in August 2013 by Eric Grossman (@EricGrossman)

### Support or Contact
mail@eric-grossman.us
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
